title: Independence Denied
description: With Independence Day near, Brad Marshall is expecting another routine day at his job as a research assistant. Then he sees a peculiar creature on one of the screens at work. While the rest of the world focuses on a sudden rash of devastating natural disasters, Brad is transfixed by the image heâ€™s seen. He refuses to give up until he knows what it is. The answer he finds, however, will change the world forever.A short story.(Collected in Dark Celebrations)
author: Calvin  Demmer
